form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION FROM IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE, Form approved OMB No. 043-R0570

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/29/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form approved Immigration and Naturalization Service OMB No. 043-RO570 Fee Stamp APPLICATION )R VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION FROM IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE RECORDS For the CONVIENCE TYPE OR PRINT THE NAME 'D MAILING ADDRESS OF THE PERSON TO WHOM the GOVERNMENT INFORMATION OR COPIES O RECORD SHOULD BE RETURNED IN THE BOX BELOW: PERSON CONSENTING NAME SOCIAL SecuRity Admin.
